docs.title: About Me
docs.text: Hello! I'm Gannon Gesiriech, a seasoned Research Engineer specializing in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and computer vision (CV). Over the past six years, I have successfully automated complex tasks, such as airport security systems and media content detection, using state-of-the-art AI technologies. My work spans across leading organizations like Leidos and Nielsen, where I have driven innovation and operational efficiency via automation.

docs.title: ResumAid - AI powered Resume Tailoring
docs.text: Our AI-powered resume tailoring application helps job seekers optimize their resumes for specific job postings. Built with Streamlit, the app leverages OpenAI's capabilities to enhance and personalize your resume, increasing your chances of landing your desired job.

docs.title: AI Consulting Services
docs.text: At Avalon Technical Solutions, we specialize in developing cutting-edge AI systems. With over 6 years of experience in designing advanced algorithmic software solutions, we are dedicated to helping businesses leverage the power of artificial intelligence to solve complex problems and drive innovation. Whether you're looking to develop custom AI solutions, enhance your existing systems, or explore new AI technologies, we're here to assist you every step of the way.

docs.title: Large Language Model (LLM) / Generative AI
docs.text:
Expertise includes agentic workflows, tooling, retrieval-augmented generation, query understanding, prompt engineering, embedding finetuning.

You should consider hiring me if:

  • You don't know how to improve your LLM products systematically.
  • You are overwhelmed by tools & frameworks.
  • Feel lost on what to prioritize and what experiments you should run.

docs.title: General AI, Computer Vision (CV), and Automation
docs.text:
Expertise includes leveraging state of the art Computer Vision to automate complex tasks.

You should consider hiring me if:

  • You need to automate complex tasks using advanced AI technologies.
  • You want to enhance your computer vision systems for better accuracy and efficiency.
  • You require expertise in developing and deploying AI-powered applications.
  • You are looking to transform traditional processes with cutting-edge automation solutions.

If you have further questions about my past work or what I can do for your project and team, get in touch via email.
